org.apache.flex.compiler.ant

Class FlexTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java
          • org.apache.flex.compiler.ant.FlexTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    COMPCTask, MXMLCTask

    public abstract class FlexTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java
    This class contains common data and logic used by all the Flex Ant tasks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlexTask

        protected FlexTask(String taskName,
        ConfigVariable[] configVariables,
        String toolJARFileName,
        String toolClassName,
        String toolMethodName,
        String toolFailureMethodName)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The name of the Ant task.
        configVariables - An array of ConfigVariables that will be set by attributes of the task.
        toolJARFileName - The build tool's jar file.
        toolClassName - The build tool's class name.
        toolMethodName - The build tool's method name.
        toolFailureMethodName - The build tool's method to determine whether an exit code means failure.

      • prepareCommandline

        protected abstract void prepareCommandline()
                                    throws org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException
        Called by execute after the set ConfigVariables in vars has been added to the commandline. This function is responsible for adding all tool-specific options to the commandline as well as setting the default options of a build tool.
        Throws:
        org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException

      • execute

        public final void execute()
                   throws org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException
        Execute the task
        Overrides:
        execute in class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java
        Throws:
        org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException - If running build tool failed
